chapter.text: 82|5|takhana pratyeke janabe, se ki age pathiyeche o ki pichane rekhe giyeche [1].
82|6|He manusa! Kise tomake tomara mahana raba samparke bibhraanta karala
82|7|Yini tomake srsti karechena, atahpara tomake suthama karechena ebam susamanjasya karechena [1]
82|8|ye akrtite ceyechena, tini tomake gathana karechena [1].
82|9|Kakhano naya, tomara to pratidana dibase mithyaropa kare thaka [1]
82|10|ara niscaya niyojita achena tomadera upara sanraksakadala
82|16|ara tara sekhana theke antarhita hate parabe na [1].
82|17|Ara kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
82|18|tarapara bali, kise apanake janabe: Pratidana dibasa ki
82|19|sedina ke'u kara'o jan'ya kichu karara malika habe na; ara sedina saba bisayera kartrtba habe allahara [1].
